titles.title: Go, Tell It On The Mountain (John W. Work Jr.)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}While shepherds kept their watching o’er silent flocks by night, Behold throughout the heavens there shone a holy light.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The shepherds heard and trembled when lo! above the earth Rang out the angel chorus that hailed our Savior’s birth.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Down in a lowly manger the humble Christ was born, And brought us God’s salvation that blessed Christmas morn.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
